class prisma.api.methods.ApiMethods¶

Bases: object

List of methods that can be callable from the API.

static clear_transactions()¶

Clear transactions in the buffer.

Created a transaction and saves it.

Parameters:
  • to_address –
  • amount –
  • from_address –
  • password –
Returns:

the transaction stored
static create_transaction_and_send(to_address, amount)¶

Creates a transaction and inserts it to the pool.

Parameters:
  • to_address – address
  • amount – int
static create_wallet(password)¶

Create a new wallet encrypted with the given password

Parameters:password –
Returns:the information of the new wallet
static decrypt_wallet(address, password)¶
static get_address_balance(address)¶

Returns the balance in an address.

Parameters:address –
Returns:balance
static get_my_balance()¶

Get the balance in the current node keystore

Returns:my balance
static last_event_time()¶

Returns the latest event time.

Returns:last event
static list_transactions()¶

Returns a list of buffered transactions.

Returns:the transaction buffer unhexified.
static list_wallets()¶

Returns a list of wallet addresses stored.

Returns:a list of wallet addresses
static peer_count()¶

Returns the number of connected peers.

Returns:a list of peers
static peer_list()¶

Returns a list with all the peers in our database.

Returns:a list of peers
static send_transactions()¶

Inserts the transactions into pool for processing.

class prisma.api.protocol.ApiFactory¶

Bases: autobahn.twisted.websocket.WebSocketServerFactory

The server, that will invoke a protocol on every new connection.

protocol¶

alias of ApiProtocol

register(client)¶

Add client to list of managed connections.

Parameters:client –
unregister(client)¶

Remove client from list of managed connections.

Parameters:client –
class prisma.api.protocol.ApiProtocol¶

Bases: autobahn.twisted.websocket.WebSocketServerProtocol

API that uses a Json interface using POST. Talks to classes and methods within prisma.

get_connected_clients_list()¶

Get a list of the connected clients.

Returns:a list of strings
onClose(wasClean, code, reason)¶

The connection has been completely closed.

Parameters:
  • wasClean –
  • code –
  • reason –
onConnect(request)¶

In this callback you can do things like:

  • checking or setting cookies or other HTTP headers
  • verifying the client IP address
  • checking the origin of the WebSocket request
  • negotiate WebSocket subprotocols
Parameters:request –
onMessage(payload, isBinary)¶

When receiving a message, unload the payload and call the corresponding function.

Parameters:
  • payload –
  • isBinary –
Returns:
onOpen()¶

Opening handshake is completed. Register the client.

send_json(payload)¶

Dumps a dictionary/list object into a json and sends it.

Parameters:payload – a dictionary/list object to transform to json and send.
Returns:

prisma.api.service module¶

class prisma.api.service.ApiService¶

Bases: object

Api Service

broadcast(payload)¶

This will push a message to all the connected clients.

Parameters:payload –
push(client, payload)¶

Sends a payload to a client.

Parameters:
  • client –
  • payload –
push_info()¶

Push notification to the client with some general information about the node.

start()¶

Start API by listening to the port.

stop()¶

Stop API by stop listening.
